text.div:
HL7 UK EDMS API Capability Statement

Minimal conformance requirements for a EDMS Server exposing a FHIR RESTful API

ModeSERVER
Description
Transaction
System History
System Search
Resource TypeProfileReadSearchUpdateCreate
DocumentReferencehttps://fhir.nhs.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-DocumentReference-1yy
Organizationhttps://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-Organization-1yy
Patienthttps://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-Patient-1yy
Practitionerhttps://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-Practitioner-1yy
PractitionerRolehttps://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-PractitionerRole-1yy

name: HL7 UK EDMS API Capability Statement
description: Minimal conformance requirements for a EDMS Server exposing a FHIR RESTful API

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Master Version Specific Identifier

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who/what is the subject of the document

searchParam.name: period
searchParam.documentation: Time of service that is being documented

searchParam.name: setting
searchParam.documentation: Additional details about where the content was created (e.g. clinical specialty)

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Kind of document (LOINC if possible)

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postal code specified in an address

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Any identifier for the organization (not the accreditation issuer's identifier)

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the organization's name or alias

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postalCode specified in an address

searchParam.name: birthdate
searchParam.documentation: The patient's date of birth

searchParam.name: email
searchParam.documentation: A value in an email contact

searchParam.name: family
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the family name of the patient

searchParam.name: gender
searchParam.documentation: Gender of the patient

searchParam.name: given
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the given name of the patient

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A patient identifier

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

searchParam.name: phone
searchParam.documentation: A value in a phone contact

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postalCode specified in an address

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A practitioner's Identifier

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A practitioner's Identifier

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: The identity of the organization the practitioner represents / acts on behalf of

searchParam.name: practitioner
searchParam.documentation: Practitioner that is able to provide the defined services for the organation
